feed.title: Ephemeral Anchors: Fixing V3 Package RBF againstpackage limit pinning

entry.title: Ephemeral Anchors: Fixing V3 Package RBF againstpackage limit pinning
entry.summary: The context is a discussion between Greg Sanders and Peter Todd regarding the standardness tests in unit/functional tests in Bitcoin Core. It is mentioned that OP_2 was an idea proposed by Luke Jr in 2017 for similar reasons and Greg arrived at the same conclusion independently. In response to Peter's question about changing test vectors, Greg clarifies that he would have to change tests that test something is non-standard. The context does not provide any further information or links to external sources.
